snippet: As it moves past the old "Reefer Madness" caricature, the reefer crowd in Colorado gets mad at the prospect of almost any regulations.
abstract: Maureen Dowd Op-Ed column observes that her troubling experience after eating too much marijuana-infused candy has not been atypical in Colorado, where regulations about standardized dosing, testing and labeling have not yet been implemented; supports companies and individuals who are pushing for sound regulations.
lead_paragraph: As it moves past the old "Reefer Madness" caricature, the reefer crowd in Colorado gets mad at the prospect of almost any regulations.
